name: Chongqing Noodle Massacre
description: WIP Mod recreating The Seafood Massacre from Hitman Contracts, in H3's Chongqing. Intending to have day and night variations

english.UI_NOODLE_BRIEFING: This is a placeholder briefing. I will try make a video briefing. I don't want the game to crash though so I've put this here.
